aboutUs.title: , the Story
aboutUs.tagline: combine to form everything we know, we transform data into actionable insights. By turning the simplest elements into tools for growth, we empower businesses to build extraordinary connections and achieve meaningful transformation.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Simplifying decision-making with data-driven insights to enable smarter, more impactful marketing.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To empower businesses to unlock their full potential through actionable, data-driven marketing insights.

explore.title: Explore
explore.description: Explore for your ideal influencer in just a few clicks. Save time with our advanced filters and find for influencers who align with your brand's message.

analyse.title: Analyse
analyse.description: Analyse an influencer's audience and performance in minutes. Access detailed information on everything from engagement to audience, all in one report.

goals.title: Achieve all your goals in one place

timeSaving.title: Time-saving
timeSaving.description: Unlock more time for your business. ION streamlines influencer search and analysis to help you find the perfect match in minutes.

competitivePricing.title: Competitive Pricing
competitivePricing.description: Access powerful influencer marketing tools at affordable prices, delivering results without the high costs.

smartInsights.title: Smart Insights
smartInsights.description: AI-powered analytics provide clear, influencer-specific insights. Make confident data-backed decisions without the guesswork

actionableData.title: Actionable Data
actionableData.description: Visualize complex data through simple, actionable insights, enabling smarter decisions without needing data expertise

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Easily connect with global audiences using tools that expand your reach and grow your business

filters.title: Advanced Filters
filters.description: for your ideal influencer in just a few clicks

parameters.title: Analytical Parameters
parameters.description: an influencer's audience and performance to find the ideal influencer in minutes

power.title: Harness the power of ION
power.description1: ION empowers businesses by automating complex processes and turning data into clear insights, saving you time and effort. Simplify influencer partnerships, make smarter decisions faster, and fuel long-term growth.

subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Join our growing community and get the latest case studies, trends, updates, and more to grow your business.

explore.title: Explore
explore.subtitle: how data can drive your success
explore.description1: Use 15 customisable filters: follower count, engagement rate, verified status, and more, to easily narrow down and find the perfect influencer match in three steps.
explore.description2: Discover influencers who inspire and engage. Apply 15 customisable filters to find the 'ideal' fit for your brand in minutes.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Apply 15 customisable filters to quickly narrow down influencers for your brand’s needs.

search.title: Search
search.description: Search and compare influencers based on key metrics like Engagement Rate, Estimated Reach, and Engaged Followers. Instantly view and evaluate your filtered list, make side-by-side comparisons and make informed decisions.

save.title: Save
save.description: Save your selected influencers to custom lists for easy reference and ready-to-go outreach when you're ready to launch your campaign.

analyse.title: Analyse
analyse.subtitle: how data can drive your success
analyse.description: Elevate your influencer marketing with comprehensive, easy-to-read reports. Access over 40 key metrics, including audience demographics, engagement rates, and performance trends. We consolidate dispersed data into a single, intuitive page, making it easy for you to assess influencer quality and predict performance—without needing in-depth data knowledge.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: Don’t just rely on follower counts. Get a true understanding of influencer impact with our detailed analysis. Quickly assess key performance metrics that matter for your business:

engagementMetrics.description: shows interactions between an influencer and their audience, indicating how effectively the content resonates with followers

audienceMetrics.description: basic details about an influencer's followers, like their age, gender, location, and interests, helping you see if their audience matches your target customers.

audience.title: Audience
audience.description: Finding the right audience is key to effective influencer marketing. Audience metrics show if an influencer’s followers align with your target market, helping you make focused marketing decisions.

ageGenderDistribution.description: Shows the age range and gender breakdown of an influencer’s audience, helping you target the right demographic for your brand

location.description: Displays the geographic location of followers, helping you target specific regions.

interests.description: Highlights the interests of followers, showing if they match your brand.

engagement.title: Engagement
engagement.description: Engagement is more than just likes, shares, and subscribes. ION's engagement analysis breaks down performance across images, feeds, and reels, providing a clear picture of an influencer’s true impact.

engagementRate.description: The ratio of interactions (likes, comments, shares) to total followers, showing how actively the audience engages with content.

reach.description: The total number of unique users who have seen the content, indicating the influencer’s overall visibility.

engagementConsistency.description: Measures the stability of engagement over time, showing how consistently the influencer’s audience interacts with their content.

title.part1: See which ION plan works for you

subtitle.part1: Unlock influencer insights with our flexible plans.
subtitle.part2: Choose the perfect option to analyse and optimise your campaigns.

featuredPost.title: Title for the featured post
featuredPost.subtitle: Sub-title for the featured post ABC123

whatIsIonkol.title: What is IONKOL?
whatIsIonkol.preview: IONKOL is a data analytics startup. We provide data-driven influencer marketing insights to help businesses discover...
whatIsIonkol.content: IONKOL is a data analytics startup. We provide data-driven influencer marketing insights to help businesses discover, manage, and optimise their influencer partnerships. By leveraging audience analytics, performance metrics, and advanced filters, IONKOL simplifies the influencer selection process, enabling businesses of all sizes to connect with the right influencers to grow their brand. Whether you're just starting or looking to scale your influencer marketing efforts, IONKOL provides the tools you need to make smarter, data-driven decisions.

howDoesIonkolWork.title: How does IONKOL work?
howDoesIonkolWork.preview: IONKOL works by offering businesses a streamlined platform to search for influencers using customisable filters like...
howDoesIonkolWork.content: IONKOL works by offering businesses a streamlined platform to search for influencers using customisable filters like location, interests, audience demographics, and engagement metrics. Once you find the right influencers, you can assess their past performance through comprehensive analytics, ensuring they align with your marketing goals.
howDoesIonkolWork.howItWorks: Here's how it works in a nutshell:

search.title: Search
search.description: Use IONKOL's advanced search filters to find influencers who match your brand's audience, niche, and goals.

analyze.title: Analyse
analyze.description: Evaluate influencers using detailed analytics, such as engagement rates, audience authenticity, and past performance.

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Reach out to influencers directly through the platform to start collaborations, track campaigns, and manage contracts.

optimize.title: Optimise
optimize.description: Review ongoing campaign performance and make adjustments to ensure the best possible ROI.

howDoesIonkolWork.conclusion: IONKOL makes influencer marketing efficient, accessible, and data-driven.

whoIsIonkolFor.title: Who is IONKOL for? Is it right for me?
whoIsIonkolFor.preview: IONKOL is designed for businesses of all sizes that want to harness the power of influencer marketing to grow their...
whoIsIonkolFor.content: IONKOL is designed for businesses of all sizes that want to harness the power of influencer marketing to grow their brand. Whether you're a small business just starting to explore influencer partnerships or a larger company looking to scale your campaigns, IONKOL has the tools you need to succeed.

smallBusinesses.title: Small to Medium Businesses
smallBusinesses.description: If you're looking for cost-effective ways to reach new customers and expand your brand presence.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Brands
ecommerce.description: To boost visibility, drive sales, and enhance customer loyalty through influencer collaborations.

marketingTeams.title: Marketing Teams
marketingTeams.description: For businesses that already work with influencers but need an easy way to streamline the process and optimise performance.

agencies.title: Agencies
agencies.description: To efficiently manage multiple influencer campaigns for clients across various industries.

contentCreators.title: Content Creators
contentCreators.description: Those looking to expand their reach and connect with brands that align with their values.

whoIsIonkolFor.conclusion: IONKOL serves businesses across various industries, including fashion, beauty, food and beverage, lifestyle, and more.

howMuchDoesIonkolCost.title: How much does IONKOL cost?
howMuchDoesIonkolCost.preview: IONKOL offers flexible pricing plans to suit the needs of businesses of all sizes. We provide both monthly and...
howMuchDoesIonkolCost.content: IONKOL offers flexible pricing plans to suit the needs of businesses of all sizes. We provide both monthly and annual subscription options, with various tiers based on the features you need and the scale of your business.

free.title: Free Plan
free.description: Try out IONKOL with limited features, perfect for small businesses just getting started with influencer marketing.

core.title: Core Plan
core.description: Starting at $100/month, ideal for small businesses that need access to more features like advanced influencer search, tracking, and reporting.

plus.title: Plus Plan
plus.description: $220/month, offering more comprehensive tools and additional support for growing businesses and larger influencer campaigns.

prime.title: Prime Plan
prime.description: $375/month, designed for large businesses with advanced needs, offering the most extensive features, analytics, and priority support.

howMuchDoesIonkolCost.discounts: We also offer discounts for annual subscriptions, allowing you to save up to 25% compared to the monthly pricing.
howMuchDoesIonkolCost.conclusion: Our pricing is designed to be affordable, with plans that grow alongside your business. Choose the plan that best fits your influencer marketing goals and start leveraging the power of influencer campaigns today.

whatMakesIonkolDifferent.title: What makes IONKOL different from others?
whatMakesIonkolDifferent.preview: IONKOL stands out in the influencer marketing landscape by offering a comprehensive platform that combines...
whatMakesIonkolDifferent.content: IONKOL stands out in the influencer marketing landscape by offering a comprehensive platform that combines data-driven insights, ease of use, and affordability.
whatMakesIonkolDifferent.keyFeatures: Here are some key features that make IONKOL unique:

dataDriven.title: Data-Driven Influencer Insights
dataDriven.description: IONKOL offers in-depth audience and engagement analytics that help you identify the right influencers, not just based on followers, but on the actual impact their audience has. Our robust parameters allow you to evaluate influencer authenticity, engagement quality, and audience relevance for more precise decision-making.

customizable.title: Customizable and Flexible Plans
customizable.description: Whether you're a small business owner just starting with influencer marketing or a large corporation running high-volume campaigns, IONKOL offers plans that scale with your needs. Plus, our intuitive platform ensures that even those with minimal marketing experience can easily navigate and run successful campaigns.

transparency.title: Transparency and Control
transparency.description: IONKOL provides complete transparency in influencer performance and analytics. This empowers businesses to make data-backed decisions and optimise their marketing strategies effectively.

education.title: Integration of Education and Tools
education.description: IONKOL is not just about offering influencer marketing tools. We provide a range of educational resources like tutorials, webinars, and blogs to help you understand the influencer marketing ecosystem and how to maximize your campaigns.

whatMakesIonkolDifferent.conclusion: IONKOL is designed to make influencer marketing accessible, actionable, and highly efficient for businesses of all sizes.

subtitle.part1: Get in touch with the right people at ION.

form.source: How did you find out about us?

consent.text: * I confirm that I have read, consent and agree to IONKOL's Terms of service and Privacy Policy

introduction.paragraph1: These Terms of Service ("Terms") constitute a legally binding agreement between Cerf Asia Sdn. Bhd. ("Ionkol") and you ("you") governing your access to and use all content, analyses, documentation, products and online services ("Services") made available via https://ionkol.com/ ("Site"). Ionkol reserve the right to amend or update these Terms at any time. Any modification will be posted on the Site. By indicating your acceptance of these Terms on the designated sign-up page, you (i) acknowledge and accept these Terms in full; (ii) agree to be bound by these Terms; and (iii) confirm that you have entered into a binding contract with Ionkol.
introduction.paragraph2: Please read these Terms carefully, as they govern your rights and obligations in respect of your use of the Site and Services.

agreementAcceptance.title: Agreement Acceptance
agreementAcceptance.content: Terms, unamended and in their entirety, constitute a binding agreement between you and Ionkol. By accessing or utilising the Site and/or Services – whether in your individual capacity or on behalf of a corporate or other legal entity – you confirm that you have read, understood and unconditionally agree to be bound by these Terms. If you enter into these Terms on behalf of a corporate or other legal entity, you hereby warrant that you possess full authority to bind that entity and its affiliates, in which event the terms "you" or "your" shall be construed to refer to such entity and its affiliates. Should you withhold your agreement, you must refrain from all use of the Site and Services.

additionalInfo.paragraph1: The Service is administered, operated and controlled by Ionkol from its offices in Asia. The content and materials provided on the Site are not intended for dissemination to or use by any individual or organisation in any jurisdiction where such distribution or use would contravene applicable law, regulation or require registration. Accordingly, any person who elects to access the Site from jurisdictions beyond those expressly contemplated does so at their sole initiative and bears all responsibility for compliance with local laws where applicable.
additionalInfo.paragraph2: Access to and registration for the Site is strictly limited to individuals aged eighteen (18) years or over. Persons under the age of eighteen are expressly prohibited from using or registering for the Site.

amendments.title: Amendments
amendments.content: Ionkol reserve the right to revise, amend or update these Terms at its discretion and without prior notice. You acknowledge that you are responsible for reviewing these Terms from time to time to remain aware of any revisions. Your continued use of the Services following the date on which any amended Terms come into effect shall constitute your acceptance of those changes. Should you disagree with the revised Terms, you must immediately cease all use of the Services.

yourUseOfService.title: Your Use of This Service
yourUseOfService.intro: Ionkol's online platform is provided to facilitate the discovery and assessment of publicly accessible social-network accounts. In particular, the platform enables you to analyse the quality of a user's followers, distinguishing genuine subscribers from those automatically generated in bad faith. Upon completion of the Services, you will receive the resulting analyses (the "Analyses").
yourUseOfService.license: Subject to your strict compliance with these Terms, Ionkol grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, personal and non-assignable licence to access and use the Site and Services. You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, trade or resell the Services or any portion thereof, nor to remove, obscure or alter any copyright or proprietary notices. You shall not copy, modify, adapt, translate or otherwise create derivative works from any content obtained via the Site and Services, nor attempt (or assist others to attempt) to reverse-engineer, decompile or disassemble any portion of the source code of the software. You undertake to comply with all applicable laws and regulations in accessing and using the Site and Services.
yourUseOfService.account: To utilise the Services, you must register for an account ("Account") and will be issued with a username and password ("User ID"). You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your User ID and must not disclose it to any third party, nor harvest or collect personal data from other Ionkol users. Ionkol reserves the absolute right to disable or suspend your Account at any time, which may prevent you from accessing the Site, your account information or any associated use of the Site.
yourUseOfService.communications: By registering with Ionkol, you consent to receive electronic communications from us, including but not limited to newsletters, product updates and promotional offers. You may opt out of any category of communication at your discretion.
yourUseOfService.dataResponsibility: You acknowledge and accept responsibility for the use, transfer and processing of any personal data supplied to you by Ionkol. Once such data is transmitted, Ionkol cannot control or be held liable for your purposes in processing. You agree that any unlawful or unauthorised use of that data, or use beyond the scope of legitimate interest, shall render you fully liable under all applicable data protection legislation.
yourUseOfService.dataSubjects: You undertake to inform each data subject that you have engaged Ionkol to process their personal data and that the analyse you receive will include, without limitation: profile name, avatar, profile description, number of likes, commenters and comment content, email address, audience classification and engagement metrics, audience interests and demographics (including age), earnings information, history of profile growth, and an assessment of audience authenticity.

provisionOfService.title: Provision of The Service
provisionOfService.content: Ionkol reserves the absolute right to amend, suspend, discontinue or otherwise vary any aspect of the Services at its sole discretion and without prior notice. You acknowledge that Ionkol may disable or terminate your access to the Services in the event of non-payment or any other material breach of these Terms, which may result in the loss of access to any content or files you have stored on the Site. You may hold and operate only one Account per person. Ionkol may use the data it collects for its own marketing and advertising purposes. Any analyses generated for such internal use will be identical in format and content to the Analyses provided to other customers and shall be governed by the same laws and regulations applicable to all Ionkol activities.

security.title: Security
security.registration: Part of the registration process for the Site, you may be required to furnish certain information, including but not limited to your name, business name, address, telephone number, credit card details and email address. By submitting such information, you represent and warrant that; (i) all information provided is true, accurate, current and complete; (ii) you will promptly update your registration details to maintain their accuracy; (iii) you possess the legal capacity to enter into and comply with these Terms; (iv) you are not a minor under the laws of your place of residence; (v) you will not access the Site by means of automated or non-human methods (e.g. scripts, bots or otherwise); (vi) you will not use the Site for any unlawful or unauthorised purpose; and (vii) your use of the Site will not contravene any applicable law or regulation.
security.termination: Should you provide any information that is untrue, inaccurate, not current or incomplete, Ionkol reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account and to refuse any present or future access to the Site, in whole or in part.
security.credentials: You are solely responsible for safeguarding any tokens, keys or passwords issued for access to the Site and Services. You accept liability for all activity conducted under your credentials. You agree to notify Ionkol immediately upon becoming aware of any unauthorised use of your credentials or any other breach of security. For the purposes of providing technical support, billing assistance or maintaining and improving the Services, Ionkol may, at its discretion, access your credentials. Ionkol further reserves the right to remove, reclaim or modify any username you select if, in its sole judgment, that username is inappropriate, obscene or otherwise objectionable.

personalDataProtection.title: Personal Data Protection
personalDataProtection.agreement: By creating an account and providing personal information to us, you agree that we may collect, use, process and disclose such personal information in accordance with the provisions of clause 7.
personalDataProtection.update: You may review and update your personal information within the Website by visiting the "Settings" page for your Account.
personalDataProtection.obligation: You are under no obligation to provide personal information to us. However, if you choose to withhold the requested personal information, you may not be able to use certain aspects of the Website and you may not be able to receive the Services.
personalDataProtection.usage: We use the personal information you provide to; (i) for registration of Account; (ii) for administrative purposes; (iii) verify and carry out payments which you make through the Site; (iv) improve the Site, Services and promotional efforts; (v) develop, operate, improve, deliver and maintain out products and services; (vi) send you information which you may find useful or which you have requested from us, provided you have indicated that you do not object to being contacted for such purposes; (vii) enforce this agreement and other policies; and (viii) to be used for internal record keeping.
personalDataProtection.sharing: We may share your personal information with; (i) service providers who may view certain information about you through the Site; (ii) our affiliates and third party service providers who assist us in providing the Site and who perform certain functions on our behalf; (iii) parties involved in a transaction involving the purchase, sale, lease, merger or amalgamation or any other acquisition, disposal, or financing of our business or portion of our business; and (iv) other parties if required to do so by law or if we believe that such disclosure is necessary to prevent fraud or crime or to protect the Site and Services or the rights, property or personal safety of any person.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.obligation: You shall keep confidential all information and materials about the Site, and all information of a secret, confidential or proprietary nature concerning our business or affairs and which is not otherwise in the public domain that may come into your knowledge or possession as a result of communications between you and Ionkol or the performance of this Agreement ("Confidential Information").
confidentiality.remedies: In the event that we discover that you have made or intend to make or cause to be made any unauthorised disclosure of the Confidential Information, we shall be entitled to take out an injunction against you to restrain you from making any such disclosure. In addition or in the alternative, as the case may be, Ionkol shall be entitled to exercise such legal and equitable remedies as are available in respect of the breach of this Agreement and to further protect the Confidential Information.
confidentiality.liability: We will not be liable for any loss or damages as a result of your failure to maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials. If you suspect any unauthorized use of your Account, you shall immediately notify Ionkol.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content: Access to and use of the Site shall be governed by Ionkol's Privacy Policy, accessible here. By accessing or using the Site, you consent to the collection, processing and use of your personal data in accordance with the provisions of that Privacy Policy. For further information, if you qualify for additional provisions of the Privacy Policy, accessible here.

chargedServices.title: Charged Services
chargedServices.intro: Certain features of the Site or Services are subject to fees ("Charged Services"). To access these Charged Services, you must subscribe to one of the plans listed on https://ionkol.com/en/pricing and complete payment for the selected plan in accordance with clause 9.5. Ionkol may, from time to time, introduce additional payment options. We will notify you of any such enhancements and amend these Terms accordingly. Ionkol shall not be responsible for any fees, commissions or charges imposed by such payment service provider - including without limitation, transaction fees, bank charges or currency conversion costs. All payments due to Ionkol shall be deemed inclusive of any such fees and commissions where applicable.
chargedServices.currency: All fees and charges are denominated in United States Dollars (USD). You agree to pay all applicable charges either by payment in full on an annual basis or by instalments on a monthly basis.
chargedServices.tax: All fees are inclusive of any applicable Value Added Tax (VAT). In territories where VAT is not levied, you may remain liable for analogous indirect taxes under local legislation. We recommend that you consult the relevant tax authorities or a professional adviser to determine your specific obligations.
chargedServices.billing: To access any Services subject to charges, you must furnish the required payment details and comply with the billing procedures in effect, which Ionkol may amend at any time without prior notice. By providing payment information, you warrant that you are authorised to use the chosen payment method and that all details supplied are accurate. Subscriptions are billed in advance on a monthly basis and are strictly non-refundable. If you elect not to renew your subscription, any unused features or credit will be forfeited upon expiry. No refunds will be issued for subscription fees—whether paid monthly or annually and/or any add-on purchases. No credits or refunds will be granted for partial use of the Services, upgrades, downgrades, unused features, and/or interruption of service due to circumstances beyond Ionkol's control. To ensure equitable treatment, all refund requests shall be declined. Downgrading your Service may result in the loss of content or functionality, and Ionkol accepts no liability for any such loss. Ionkol further reserves the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Services for non-payment. In the event of termination of a monthly subscription prior to the end of its term, you remain liable for the full unexpired period, and you shall bear any costs incurred by Ionkol in recovering outstanding amounts, including debt-collection fees.
chargedServices.payment: We accept payment via Visa and Mastercard. Ionkol reserves the right to correct any pricing errors or mistakes—even after an order has been placed or payment received—and to refuse or cancel any order at our sole discretion.
chargedServices.storage: Ionkol does not store any credit or debit card information.

content.title: Content
content.usage: You may use any data or content obtained and displayed through the Services solely for informational purposes. You acknowledge that such data may not be comprehensive and is derived from third-party sources, and that Ionkol makes no representations as to its accuracy, completeness or reliability. Any use of that data beyond the scope expressly permitted herein is strictly prohibited. Certain data may require access to third-party websites, which may restrict or prevent Ionkol from providing such content. Furthermore, legal or regulatory requirements may limit Ionkol's ability to use or disclose specific data. You agree to assess and assume all risks associated with your reliance on the Services. By using the Site and Services, you represent and warrant that you possess the requisite financial and commercial expertise to evaluate the merits and risks of the information provided and to apply the Services as an analytical tool. The Services are supplied "as is" without warranty of any kind, and your use thereof is at your sole discretion and risk.
content.externalSites: The Site may include hyperlinks to third-party websites or resources ("External Sites"). Ionkol does not endorse, control or assume responsibility for the availability, content or materials on any External Sites.
content.objectionableContent: You acknowledge that, in accessing the Site, you may encounter material that you find harmful, offensive, threatening, indecent or otherwise objectionable. Ionkol accepts no liability for any such content, including but not limited to explicit language or other potentially offensive material.
content.attribution: You shall acknowledge Ionkol as the originator of all data and content supplied under these Terms. Whenever you publish, display or otherwise disseminate Ionkol data or content online, you must; (i) Include a hyperlink to https://ionkol.com/; (ii) Display the Ionkol logo in a clear and prominent manner; and (iii) Credit the material with "powered by Ionkol."

restrictions.title: Restrictions
restrictions.general: You may only utilise the Services as expressly permitted by these Terms. Any other use is strictly prohibited, including but not limited to; (i) exceeding five requests to the Site per second; and (ii) one account per individual.

prohibitedActivities.accessingChargedServicesWithoutPayment: Accessing any Charged Services without fully completing the associated payment obligations.
prohibitedActivities.alteringTamperingService: Altering, rerouting or otherwise tampering with the Service or its delivery mechanisms.
prohibitedActivities.retainingUsingDataAfterRemovalRequest: Retaining or using any data or content after Ionkol or the relevant data subject has requested its removal; in such event you must erase that information within seventy-two hours and ensure all third-party recipients do likewise.
prohibitedActivities.broadcastingReproducingServices: Broadcasting, reproducing, republishing, posting, transmitting or distributing any portion of the Services (other than as specifically allowed pursuant to these Terms).
prohibitedActivities.assigningResellingInformation: Assigning, syndicating, reselling or otherwise transferring to third parties any information obtained via the Services without Ionkol's prior written consent.
prohibitedActivities.copyingReverseEngineeringServices: Copying, adapting, creating derivative works, attempting to discover any source code, reverse-engineering or disassembling the Services, or permitting any third party to do so.
prohibitedActivities.harmingIonkolOrAffiliates: Use the Services in any manner that, in Ionkol's sole judgment, harms Ionkol or its affiliates, resellers, distributors, customers, service providers or suppliers.
prohibitedActivities.damagingInterferingServices: Using the Services in a way that damages, disables, overburdens or impairs them or interferes with any other user's use.
prohibitedActivities.incorporatingMetaTags: Incorporating meta-tags or other hidden text utilising Ionkol's name or trademarks without prior written authorisation.
prohibitedActivities.displayingSiteWithinFrames: Displaying the Site or its content within frames, or by any other means, without Ionkol's prior written consent.
prohibitedActivities.breachingThirdPartyTerms: Utilising the Services in breach of any third-party terms of use or other agreements, including any requirement to obtain written permission for certain content.
prohibitedActivities.stalkingHarassingCollectingPersonalData: Use the Services to stalk, harass, collect or store personal data about any other individual.
prohibitedActivities.compilingFalseMisleadingInformation: Use any method to compile false or misleading information or content.
prohibitedActivities.exploitingHarmToMinors: Exploiting the Services in any way that causes harm to minors.
prohibitedActivities.infringingIntellectualProperty: Use the Services in a manner that infringes the intellectual property or other proprietary rights of any third party.
prohibitedActivities.unauthorizedAccessToSystems: Using the Services to gain unauthorised access to third-party systems, user accounts, computer networks or services.
prohibitedActivities.impersonatingIonkolOrThirdParty: Employing Ionkol's domain name or contact details as a return address to impersonate Ionkol or any third party.
prohibitedActivities.creatingMultipleTokensKeysPasswords: Creating multiple tokens, keys or passwords for disruptive or abusive purposes, or with overlapping use cases; bulk creation may result in suspension of all related credentials and, in the event of any breach, permanent deactivation.
prohibitedActivities.harvestingDataViaAutomatedMeans: Utilising non-human manner, automated programmes, bots, screen-scraping tools or other unauthorised means to harvest data.
prohibitedActivities.multipleAccountsOrPromotionalPlans: Acknowledging that, should Ionkol, in its sole discretion, detect multiple accounts or promotional plans associated with a single individual, Ionkol may terminate such accounts or campaigns without prior notice or refund.

publicity.title: Publicity
publicity.content: You hereby authorise Ionkol to feature your name and corporate logo among its clientele listings and on its website.

cancellationTermination.title: Cancellation or Termination
cancellationTermination.userCancellation: You may cancel the Services at any time, with or without cause. You acknowledge that upon cancellation; (i) no refund will be issued; (ii) you remain liable for all fees accrued through the end of your current subscription term; and (iii) your access to the Services, including any keys or passwords, will be withdrawn.
cancellationTermination.ionkolTermination: Ionkol may, at its sole discretion and with or without prior notice, suspend or terminate your keys, passwords or access to the Services for cause. Cause includes, without limitation, any breach of these Terms, discontinuation of the Services or Site, prolonged inactivity, legal compulsion or non-payment of fees.
cancellationTermination.effects: Upon cancellation or termination for any reason; (i) all rights to access and use the Services shall immediately cease; (ii) any keys or passwords issued to you shall be deactivated; and (iii) Ionkol shall bear no liability to you or any third party arising from such cessation.
cancellationTermination.survival: On expiry or termination of this Agreement, all licences granted hereunder shall immediately terminate, and you must permanently delete any data provided by Ionkol. Clauses 6 through 10 and clause 22, together with your obligation to pay any outstanding fees, including but not limited to those due under clause 11.1.(ii), shall survive any expiry or termination of this Agreement for any reason.
cancellationTermination.refunds: Consistent with clause 9.4, no refunds, credits or prorated payments shall be made for partial use of the Services, upgrades, downgrades, unused features, service interruptions beyond Ionkol's reasonable control or any termination of the Agreement. Downgrading may result in loss of content or functionality; Ionkol accepts no liability for such loss. In the event of non-payment, Ionkol reserves the right to suspend or terminate your access and to recover any unpaid subscription fees, including costs of collection.

proprietaryRights.title: Proprietary Rights
proprietaryRights.ownership: The Site and all related Services are and shall remain the sole and exclusive property of Ionkol. Except as expressly set forth herein, no rights, title or interest in the Site or Services are granted to you, whether by implication, estoppel or otherwise.
proprietaryRights.notices: You must not remove, obscure or amend any proprietary notices—including copyright, trademark or other legal legends—affixed to or contained within the Site or Services.
proprietaryRights.copyright: Ionkol holds the copyright in the Site as a compilation and in all Services delivered through the Site. All materials displayed on the Site—such as text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, data compilations and software—are protected by international copyright laws and remain the property of Ionkol or its licensors.
proprietaryRights.trademarks: Any third-party trade names, trademarks or service marks appearing on the Site or in the Services are owned by their respective proprietors.
proprietaryRights.confidential: Certain information within the Services may be designated confidential. You undertake not to disclose any such confidential material without the prior written authorisation of Ionkol.

forceMajeure.title: Force Majeure
forceMajeure.content: Ionkol shall not be liable for any failure to perform its obligations under these Terms if the failure results in Ionkol being unable to observe or perform on time its obligation. This includes but not limited to acts of God, fire, flood, accident, riot, war, government intervention, embargoes, strikes, labour difficulties, equipment failures, or any other case or any other cause beyond control.

invalidityUnenforceability.title: Invalidity or Unenforceability
invalidityUnenforceability.content: If any of these Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable for any reason or to any extent, such invalidity or enforceability shall not in any manner affect or render invalid or unenforceable the remaining Terms.

limitationOfLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.content: To the fullest extent permissible under applicable law, in no event shall Ionkol be liable to you or any third party for any direct, indirect, punitive, exemplary, incidental, special or consequential damages (whether in contract, tort, or otherwise) arising out of or in connection with this Agreement, including, but not limited to, any loss of use, loss of data, business interruption, loss of income or profits, irrespective of whether it had advance notice of the possibility of any such damages.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Ionkol, its officers, directors, employees, managers, shareholders, agents, representatives, subsidiaries, affiliates, suppliers, and licensors from, and against, any claims, proceedings, losses, expenses, damages and costs, including legal fees, arising out of or in connection with; (i) your access of the Site and Services; (ii) use of your Account other than in accordance with this Agreement; (iii) your use of the Site and Services; (iv) your breach of Terms of this Agreement; (v) your violation of law; (vi) your negligence or wilful misconduct; (vii) your violation of the rights of a third party, including the infringement by you of any intellectual property or misappropriation of any proprietary right or trade secret of any person or entity.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right at any time and from time to time to modify, suspend or discontinue, temporarily or permanently the Site and Services or any part thereof, with or without notice. You agree that we will not be liable to you or any third-party for any modification, suspension or discontinuance of the Site or any portion thereof.

governingLawJurisdiction.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLawJurisdiction.content: This Agreement shall be governed by Malaysia law, without regard to excluding its conflicts of law principles. Any disputes, actions, claims or causes of action arising out of or in connection with this Agreement shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Malaysia.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions about these terms, kindly contact us at x@ionkol.com

disclaimerWarranties.title: Disclaimer of Warranties And Limitation Of Liability
disclaimerWarranties.content: In accordance with clause 15 through clause 19, To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law, Ionkol and its affiliates, officers, employees, agents, partners and licensors expressly disclaim all warranties, whether express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, accuracy, adequacy or completeness of any information presented on the Site or produced by the Services. The Site and Services are provided on an "as-is" and "as-available" basis without any representation or warranty that they will meet your requirements, be uninterrupted, error-free or secure, or that any defects will be remedied. In no event shall Ionkol or its affiliates be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, punitive or consequential damages, including loss of profits, revenues, data or use, incurred by you or any third party, whether in an action under contract, tort (including negligence), statute or otherwise, even if Ionkol has been advised of the possibility of such damages. Moreover, Ionkol's aggregate liability for any cause of action arising out of or relating to these Terms or the Services shall not exceed the fees actually paid by you for the specific Services giving rise to the claim. Ionkol shall not be liable for any delay or failure to perform its obligations under these Terms if such delay or failure arises from circumstances beyond its reasonable control, including but not limited to acts of God, war, terrorism, civil disturbance, labour disputes, governmental regulations, internet failures, power outages or other similar events. No advice or information, whether oral or written, obtained from Ionkol or through the Services shall create any warranty not expressly stated in these Terms.
